paper_abstract: Quite recently [IEEE Commu Letters Vol 14 No 1 2010] Choi et al proposed a handover authentication scheme using credentials based on chameleon hashing claiming to provide several security features including Perfect Forward/Backward Secrecy (PFS/PBS) This paper examines the security of the scheme and shows that the scheme still fails to achieve PFS/PBS unlike their claims
paper_title: Cryptanalysis of a Handover Authentication Scheme Using Credentials Based on Chameleon Hashing
